definition: soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
Chinese Football Association Cup/soccer association cup

sentences.english: Runner-up of Dutch National Cup in 2003.

sentences.chinese: 足協官員說，“我們提出了‘四不原則’。

sentences.chinese: 津巴布韋足協主席萊奧穆加貝在外面攔住我。

sentences.english: Today, there are thousands of women players in the Chinese Football Association.
sentences.chinese: 現在有上千女足球運動員在中國足協。

sentences.english: They despise Xie Yalong, who leads the federation.
sentences.chinese: 他們輕視謝亞龍，足協主席。

sentences.english: Several senior officials from the Chinese Football Association have been arrested over match-fixing allegations.
sentences.chinese: 幾名中國足協的高官由於操縱假球受到指控並被逮捕。

sentences.chinese: 這是巴西足協的官方聲明。

sentences.english: Here is a pic of me during last FIGC (Italian football association) meeting.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一張我上次在意大利足協會議上的一張照片。

sentences.english: Capello has also met the FA's new chairman, David Bernstein.
sentences.chinese: 這位足協新掌門早前曾擔任曼城俱樂部主席。

sentences.english: JAPAN want to lure back Arsene Wenger as their national team manager.

sentences.chinese: 然而也只是在最近一段時間，足協的變革才大獲成功。

sentences.english: But the Brazilian Football Federation (CBF) said that Dunga and his technical staff had been dismissed.

sentences.english: I believe there will not be any more meetings with the other candidates.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲足協將不會再與其他候選人見面。

sentences.english: The club faces expulsion from the football league.
